College_Summary: Shekhawati Institute, Sikar, Rajasthan, was established in 2013. It is an institute dedicated to excellence and maintaining high consistency in academics. The institute offers undergraduate and postgraduate courses in Management, Information Technology Science, Commerce and Arts. It offers B.Sc, BA, BBA, B.Com, BCA, M.Sc, M.A, M.Com courses in various specializations. The admission is based on merit and application mode is both online and offline.

College_Name: Shankara International School of Management- [SISM], Jaipur

College_Summary: University Maharaja College located at Jaipur was established in the year 1844. It has been affiliated to the University of Rajasthan. It has gained the status of 'College with Potential of Excellence' by UGC. The college offers BCA, B.Sc., B.Sc.(Hons) at the undergraduate level under highly qualified faculties. Admission to the courses is granted based on merit in the qualifying examination. Multinational companies like TCS, Accenture, and Wipro recruit students from this college

College_Name: Medical & Technology Institute of Nursing - [MTIN], Jaipur
College_Summary: Suratgarh P.G College is a co-educational institute established in the year 2004. The institute is affiliated to Maharaja Ganga Singh University and is recognized by UGC under section 2(f) & 12(b). It offers BA, B.Sc., B.Com, BCA at the UG level, M.Sc., MA, M.Com at the PG level, and also 4-year integrated courses like BA-B.Ed. and B.Sc.-B.Ed. Admissions are granted on the basis of merit. The college is equipped with good infrastructural facilities and has well-educated faculties for an excellent learning environment.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Arts [BA] + Bachelor of Education [B.Ed]

College_Summary: Rabindranath Tagore Medical College, also known as RNT Medical College, was established in 1961 in Udaipur, Rajasthan and is affiliated to the Rajasthan Institute of Health Sciences, Jaipur. RNT Medical College offers MBBS, MD, MS, DM and M.Ch courses under UG and PG categories. The admission to all the courses is done on the basis of the entrance examinations.  Application for admission is available in both online and offline mode for this college. The college spreads over 57 acres of land and is situated in the heart of the City.

The college offers students a MBBS degree, Paramedical courses and Research programs and much more. The hospital inside the campus provides a great opportunity for the students to get practical knowledge and make it easier for them to shift from being a student to being a doctor. Admission to the courses is done on the basis of marks secured in the entrance test required as per the courses. Last year, the cutoff marks for NEET went 617-1130 for the General category.

The college is affiliated with Rajasthan University and Mahatma Gandhi University of Medical Sciences & Technology, Jaipur. The college is recognized by National Medical Commission (NMC). Mahatma Gandhi College Jaipur offers undergraduate, postgraduate and super speciality courses in the field of medical science.

College_Summary: Maharani College Jaipur is a girl’s college situated in Jaipur, Rajasthan. It offers UG programs with several specialties in three streams: science, commerce, and arts. The popular SFS courses offered at the college are BA, B.Sc., B.Com, BCA. Admission is done on the basis of academic merit in class 12th from a recognized board. Applicants can apply both online and offline for admission to the institute.

Maharana Pratap Government PG College was founded in the year 1962 at Chittorgarh, Rajasthan. The college is affiliated to the Mohanlal Sukhadia University and accredited by NAAC. It is a leading college in the Chittorgarh district providing quality education for both Boys and Girls. The college offers Undergraduate and Postgraduate courses in the field of Arts, Science and Commerce. It has an experienced & talented team of faculty members and a top-class infrastructure.

Rajasthan Pharmacy College (RPC), Jaipur is a private pharmacy college established in the year 2006. The college is affiliated with the Rajasthan University of Health Sciences (RUHS), Jaipur, and is approved by AICTE and PCI. It offers B.Pharma at the UG level, M.Pharma at the PG level, and also D.Pharmacy under the guidance of highly-educated faculties. The college has great infrastructural facilities and provides excellent placement opportunities to students in reputed organizations.

College_Name: Maharana Pratap Government Post Graduate College, Chittorgarh

College_Summary: SSG Pareek PG College is a private Institution located in Jaipur, Rajasthan was established in 1925 and was upgraded to a degree college in 1955. It became a post-graduate college in 1993. It offers PG courses comprising the disciplines of Science, Commerce and Arts as well as Professional Courses. Top courses include B.Sc, BBA, B.Com, BCA, BA, M.A, M.Sc, M.Com, and Certification. The admission is based on merit.

College_Name: Lal Bahadur Shastri College of Pharmacy - [LBS], Jaipur

College_Summary: Pacific Medical University (PMU) situated in beautifully surrounded by lush green hills of Bhillo Ka Bedla Pratappura in Udaipur, Rajasthan. It is under the aegis of Tirupati Balaji Educational Trust. PMU offers wide range of courses from which one can choose. The Trust’s Mission is to bring standard health care within the reach of every individual while committed to achieving and maintaining excellence.

College_Name: Seth G.L. Bihani S.D. PG College, Sriganganagar
College_Summary: The highlights of Rajasthan University of Health Science (RUHS) are tabulated below:

Pacific Medical College and Hospital Udaipur is one of the newly built private medical colleges in Rajasthan. It was established in the year 2014 and it is the unit of Tirupati balaji educational trust.

Pacific Dental College and Research Center - [PDCRC], Udaipur
College_Summary: Global Centre for Entrepreneurship and Commerce (GCEC) is a private college situated in Jaipur, Rajasthan. It is India’s first dedicated college for Entrepreneurship and Commerce studies which integrates 3 years of practical learning and an open book curriculum based on international study patterns. GCEC is affiliated with Vivekananda Global University and accredited to National Assessment and Accreditation Council (NAAC). The most popular courses of the institute include BBA in 2 specializations and a 2 year MBA program in International Finance. Apart from that, the college also offers a B.Com course across 3 specializations and a Ph.D program in Entrepreneurship and Management. Selection to the courses is based on the candidate’s academic performance as well as a Case-Study Test and Personal Interview conducted by the institute.

College_Summary: ICRI is a private Institute that was established in 2004 is situated in Jaipur and is known as one of the most reputed institutions in Rajasthan. The institute is collaborated with Jaipur National University. Since its establishment, the institute has been constantly growing with the aim of achieving the best in class education system for the students. Due to its excellence in education in New Age Careers i.e. Aviation, Logistics, Healthcare & Clinical Research, the ICRI Jaipur has successfully collaborated with more than 2000 leading industries in India.

College_Summary: School of Distance Learning of Jagan Nath University, JIMS Group has been established in 2010 by Distance Education Council. The university promotes quality education to all who are not able to pursue higher conventional method of education due to some reasons. It is affiliated to Jagan Nath University which is an ISO 9001-2015 Certified Institution.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Post Graduate Diploma in Computer Applications [PGDCA]

College_Summary: School Of Distance Education And Learning (SODEL Jaipur) is an open Institute, providing courses in Management, Science and Arts stream. There are 5 UG, 3 PG and various other Diploma courses offered by SODEL. Affiliated to Jaipur National University which is considered to be the topmost university in Rajasthan and is among the top 20 private universities in India. The admission to various courses is done through both online as well as offline mode.

College_Summary: Government Medical college Bharatpur was established by the government of Rajasthan and has been ranked as the 96th best medical college in India. The college reached this milestone in just 2 years and is featured as the 12th best medical school in Rajasthan. The continuous development in infrastructure, resources are making this a prior option for many medical aspirants to know more about GMC Bharatpur.

College_Name: Jayoti Vidyapeeth Women’s University, Directorate of Distance Education, Jaipur

College_Summary: Jain Vishva Bharati Institute or JVBI is one of the leading and most admired Universities in India. It offers more than 60 UG, PG, M.Phil., Certification and Diploma courses in Management Studies, Social Science/Humanities, Sciences, and Education in both Regular and Distance-Learning Mode.

College_Name: SGVU Directorate of Distance Education, Jaipur

College_Summary: Neewara Academy of Design is a premier Design Academy established in the heart of Jaipur at Banipark providing a unique approach to design education with a wide range of programs for all ages and for all skill levels. The institute was established in the year 2016 and is run by Zindagi Charitable Trust. Neewara Academy of Design is affiliated to  Rajasthan ILD Skills University (RISU), Government of India and approved by AICTE.

College_Summary: Ellen College of Design, established in 2012 is a private institute affiliated to RISU, Jaipur. The institute offers 4 UG courses, 2 PG courses, and 6 Diploma courses in the disciplines of Fashion and Interior Design. The flagship courses of the institute are the B.Sc program across 2 specializations and an M.Sc degree course in 2 specializations. Apart from that, ECD also runs Diploma, Advanced Diploma, Graduate Diploma, and B.Voc courses in Fashion Design as well as Interior Design. Admission to the courses offered by the institute will be done based on the candidate's performance in the previous qualifying examination.

College_Name: ZEE Institute of Media Arts - [ZIMA], Jaipur
College_Summary: Heights Institute of Fashion and Technology Jaipur is a private institute which was established in 2003. The institute is affiliated to National Skill Development Corporation (NSDC) & Skill India HIFT, a subunit of S.K. Education Pvt. Ltd. Delhi. The institute offers Diploma, Integrated Diploma, Certificate and Professional courses in the Discipline of Interior Design, Fashion Design, Textile Design and Event Management. The duration of these courses varies between 3 months to 3 years. The HIFT received the National Education Excellence Award in 2019 for being the best private design institute in Jaipur.

The vision of the university is to promote skill education in a holistic and integrated manner.

This University is started to provide better facilities for higher education in the state. Students are offered study programs such as Undergraduate, Postgraduate Ph.D. courses in this college. Admission to the courses is offered on the basis of merit scored in the qualifying examination.

College_Summary: Raj Rishi Bhartrihari Matsya University (RRBMU), formerly known as Matsya University, is a state university located in Alwar, Rajasthan. Established in the year 2012, RRBMU is UGC-approved with NAAC grade ‘B’ accreditation. RRBMU has more than 100 affiliated colleges which include government, private, and law colleges.

College_Summary: Kota Polytechnic College (KPC) at Kota was established in 2012 by Oasis Educational Society, Jaipur. It is approved by AICTE, New Delhi & Govt. Of Rajasthan and found Affiliated to BTER, Jodhpur. College offers diploma in engineering across 3 specializations. Candidates who want admission in Kota polytechnic can either register through DTE Rajasthan Counselling office or the official website of the college by following applicable steps. The Kota Polytechnic College Training & Placements Department Cell helps in preparing the students to competitive in this world. Top recruiting companies of the college are: Vivo, Ericson, Alok Industries, CompuCom, and Ashok Leyland.

Kota College of Pharmacy is a prestigious pharmacy college established in the year 2004. It is affiliated to the Rajasthan University of Health Sciences and approved by PCI and AICTE. The college is committed to the development of pharmacy education and aims at producing top-class pharmacists. It offers Undergraduate, Postgraduate, and Research programs in the field of pharmacy. The college has an experienced faculty team along with the latest aids and equipment to provide effective teaching and facilitate the learning process.

Government Polytechnic College (GPC), Alwar is a prestigious technical institute established in the year 1960. It is running under the overall control of the Directorate of Technical Education Rajasthan, Jodhpur & Ministry of Technical Education, Rajasthan Government. The college offers Diploma courses in Civil Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Electrical Engineering & Electronics Engineering. The courses have been affiliated with the Board of Technical Education Rajasthan.

Arya College was founded by the All India Arya Samaj Society for Higher & Technical Education in 1999. The college is affiliated to RTU / RUHS / RU. All Courses at Arya College is affiliated to Rajasthan Technical University (RTU, Kota) and approved by AICTE. The college offers B.Tech, B.Pharma, BA, BBA, B.Com, B.Sc at the UG level and M.Tech, MBA and M.Pharma at the PG level.  Check: Arya College Courses and Fees

College_Summary: JIET Institute of Design and Technology is an esteemed and prestigious institution of technology and design in Rajasthan, devoted to cause of promoting technical and scientific literacy and Temperament in the young inquisitive minds right from its inception in 2007. The institute is ranked 12th as per the QIV ranking of BTU. The multi-disciplinary campus JIETDAT is a trustworthy name in Rajasthan as it provides multiple opportunities for gaining insights into professional education through the availability of resources.

College_Name: Geetanjali College of Science And Commerce - [GCSC], Udaipur
College_Summary: Government Polytechnic College was established in the year 1958 and is approved by AICTE. The College offers Diploma programmes in numerous specializations.

College_Name: JIET Institute of Design & Technology, Jodhpur
College_Summary: Government Polytechnic College, Jhalawar, Rajasthan was established in the year 2006. It is a state run college which is affiliated to the Board of Technical Education Rajasthan, Jodhpur and is approved by AICTE. The college offers polytechnic diploma courses in Electronics Engineering, Computer Science & Engineering, Electrical Engineering and Mechanical Engineering. Admissions to this college is completely based on merit. Candidates can fill the application form on online mode.

College_Name: Government Ram Chandra Khaitan Polytechnic College, Jaipur
College_Summary: Marudhara Private Industrial Training Institute, Sikar is a training institution affiliated to NCVT and DGET. It is situated in Laxmangarh tehsil of Sikar district Rajasthan State at mukundgarh- Salasar Road. The Institute is surrounded mostly by the rural people. College offers Certificate course for the candidates who want to become Electricians, after passing their 10th exam from any recognised board. Apply Online on the official website of the college to get admission into the institution. College has various facilities like drawing hall, Audio visual hall, Computer Lab, play area, workshops, and many more. Since, the candidate is pursuing the electrician-oriented course, their placements will be limited to that only.

Aryan Polytechnic College, Ajmer is one of the best institutions in Rajasthan that provides technical education to eligible candidates. The institute was established under the Aryan Educational Society. The Institute is approved by AICTE, New Delhi and holds its affiliation with the Board of Technical Education, Rajasthan. The Institute offers 3 years diploma course in three streams. The admission to this institute is regulated by DTE, Rajasthan, which allocates seat based on the merit list prepared from the filled data. Because of the coordinated efforts of faculty and students, the Institute is able to be the leading technical institute of the state.

Shri Gokul Verma Govt. Polytechnic College, Bharatpur is a well-known Polytechnic Institute in Rajasthan. The College offers diploma Courses in different branches to its students. It is affiliated to Directorate of Technical Education, under the State Govt. Of Rajasthan and the courses available here are approved by AICTE. The Minimum Criteria for Admission here is completion of 10th Standard. The College is a Good choice for the students, who wish to pursue Diploma Courses in Different branches of Engineering. The College fulfils all the basic requirements of Students and further help them in developing themselves via their diploma courses.

College_Name: Marudhara Private Industrial Training Institute, Sikar
College_Summary: Government Polytechnic College, Dholpur (GPCD) is an institution to offer diploma courses approved by AICTE (All India Council of Technical Education). College offers diploma courses in 3 major branches of Engineering. Admission into the college can either be online through college or be offline through DTE Rajasthan Counselling. The Institution campus is imaginatively laid-out with a vivid landscape of over 5 acres. The campus provides all essential amenities for community living like playing fields, seminar hall, E- Mitra+, Internet connectivity, and canteen, etc.

College_Name: Shri Gokul Verma Govt. Polytechnic College, Bharatpur
College_Summary: Shri Bhawani Niketan Polytechnic, Jodhpur is one of the top-ranking institutes in Rajasthan. The college offers diploma degree in five courses across the Engineering domain. It admits students solely on the basis of merit obtained in 10th / 12th board examination or its equivalent. The placement record of the college has been quite impressive and increasing over the years with top recruiters like sulekha.com and Vodafone, etc. The college has a huge lush green campus with modern day infrastructure keeping in mind the needs of students and is situated just 5 km away from the Jaipur Railway Station.

PNB Polytechnic College is one of the few polytechnic colleges in Jaipur. The college was established under the parent organization named PNB Shikshan Sansthan. The institute is providing technical education to the interested candidates and is open to both men and women of all sections of society. The institute is approved by AICTE, New Delhi, and is affiliated to the Department of Technical Education, Rajasthan (DTER), Jodhpur. The college offers diploma programs in five disciplines to the eligible students. The admission to this institute is being regulated by DTER, Jodhpur.

College_Name: Imperial Institute of Polytechnic & Technology - [IIPT], Jaipur
College_Summary: Yaduvanshi Polytechnic at Jhunjhunu, Rajasthan is one of the Yaduvanshi Group of Institutions established for offering technical skills-oriented courses. It is approved by AICTE and it is running under Ministry of Technical Education, Government of Rajasthan and Directorate of Technical Education Rajasthan, Jodhpur. The college offers 4 diploma courses under the aegis of Engineering discipline. The admission proceedings of all the four diploma courses are done merit-based.

CMRB Government Polytechnic College, Sriganganagar is one among the top Polytechnic Institutes in Sriganganagar, Rajasthan. This College is approved by AICTE and is affiliated to Directorate of Technical Education under Government of Rajasthan. The institution provides diploma Courses to its students in different branches of Engineering. The Minimum Criteria to apply for admission to the college is completion of 10th standard. The college provides both theoretical and practical knowledge to its students which helps them in enhancing their knowledge and skills.

Govindam Polytechnic College, Sikar in Rajasthan state is a polytechnic institution offering diploma courses across 5 branches. Candidates who want admission in Govindam polytechnic College can either register through DTE Rajasthan Counselling office or through the official website of the college itself. Admission is based on the meritorious ranking of each candidate applying to the diploma course. Govindam Polytechnic College impart technical education in science to help needy and economically weaker students inculcate discipline, sincerity, devotion, develop qualities of leadership, and better placements opportunities.

Jaipur Institute of Polytechnic and Technology is one of the outstanding technical institutions in Rajasthan that belongs to the Marudhara Group of Education. This unit of Polytechnic Institution was established by the Marudhara groups in 2010 by getting it affiliated to the Board of Technical Education, Rajasthan.

Established in 2011, Mishri Devi Memorial Polytechnic College is an institute which aims at imparting technical education and creating technical manpower to meet current and future challenges and demands of the technological industry.

Established in the year 2011, Rajesh Pilot Government Polytechnic College, Dausa, Rajasthan, a state-run college has created quite a name for itself in a short period in the State of Rajasthan. It offers diploma courses in various Engineering branches. Admissions to this premier college are strictly based on merit. Candidates can fill in the application form in online mode only.

College_Name: Jaipur Institute of Polytechnic and Technology - [JIPT], Jaipur
Mishri Devi Memorial Polytechnic College Todabhim, Karauli
College_Summary: Birla Technical Training Institute was established in year 1988 and is affiliated to BTER Jodhpur. The institute is recognized by AICTE, New Delhi. This institute offers Polytechnic engineering diploma courses in different streams. The admission to this Institute is merit-based and candidates can apply to this Institute online. The Institute has positioned in top 10 placement as well as training institutes in India.

College_Name: Rajesh Pilot Government Polytechnic College, Dausa
US Ostwal Institute Of Technology And Science, Chittorgarh
College_Summary: Swami Keshwanand Institute of Technical Education (SKITE) was established in 2010. It is located in Sikar and is one of the best polytechnics institutes of Rajasthan. It is approved by AICTE. SKITE offers a full time 3 year Diploma programme across six specializations, namely-. Civil Engineering, Computer Science Engineering, Electronics & Communication Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Electrical Engineering, and Electronics Engineering. Admission is done on the basis of merit.

College_Name: Birla Technical Training Institute  Pilani - [BITTI], Pilani

College_Summary: Aryan Polytechnic College, Kota, established in 2014, is situated in the educational hub - Kota, Rajasthan. In the past, Kota had the distinction of being the Educational Capital of Rajasthan.

College_Name: Swami Keshwanand Institute of Technical Education-[SKITE], Sikar

College_Summary: Dr. RadhaKrishnan Polytechnic College is a prestigious polytechnic college established in the year 2010. It is affiliated to the Board of Technical Education Rajasthan and has been approved by AICTE. The college offers Diploma programs across Civil Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Electronics Engineering, Computer Science Engineering, and Mechanical Engineering under highly qualified and experienced faculty. The campus spreads over an area of 13 acres with a majestic infrastructure surrounded by greenery
Agriculture University, Kota was established under the Agriculture University, Kota Act of 2013 by the Government of Rajasthan. The institute is affiliated to ICAR and is known as a State University.

Diploma College called Government Polytechnic College Jodhpur was established in 1958 on the premises of MBM Engineering College, Jodhpur. The College started with an intake capacity of 240 students and three diploma engineering disciplines and now offers 6 different 3-years diploma courses in different engineering areas in Civil Engineering, Computer Science Engineering, Electronics and Fiber Optics Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Petroleum Engineering. Interested Candidates have to apply for the courses online and the eligible candidates would be selected based on the merit marks.

College_Name: Government Residential Women Polytechnic College, Jodhpur

College_Summary: School of Management & Entrepreneurship, IIT, Jodhpur is one of the premier colleges, started its academic program in 2020. School of Management & Entrepreneurship, comes under the aegis of IIT Jodhpur,  offers PG and PhD programs in Marketing, Finance, Management, Accounting and many more. MBA is the major course of SME, IIT Jodhpur. Admission to MBA programs is done on the basis of the CAT entrance exam. For international students, the candidates must have scored valid marks in GRE/GMAT entrance tests. In addition to this, the college also offers PhD in Management. The candidates who have passed their Master's are eligible to apply.

College_Summary: Agarwal Institute of Hotel Management (AIHM), Jaipur is an integral part of one of the premier institutions of Rajasthan, namely, Agarwal P.G. College, managed by Agrawal Shiksha Samiti. The college also has International tie-ups with various corporates, hotels and colleges that facilitate the training and placements of the students. Some of the recruiters of AIHM are Accor Group of Hotels, C. K. Birla Group, Fortis Hospitals, Leela Group of Hotels, Lalit Group of Hotels, Shoppers Stop, etc. AIHM offers degree, diploma and certificate courses in the discipline of Hotel Management, Personality Development, Fashion Design and many more. Admissions are done on the basis of the entrance test conducted by the institute.

Dr. Bhimrao Ambedkar Law University, Jaipur known for its legal studies, was established in 2013 by the state government. Graduates from BALU Jaipur get an average salary package ranging from INR 3 LPA to INR 6 LPA. The university offers various UG, PG, and Doctoral courses to students in the field of Law. Admission to which is entrance-based. Eligible candidates may apply online as well as offline for admission.

Admissions are done on the basis of marks obtained in various national and state entrance exams. The institute has witnessed 100% placement for its MBA program. The highest package is offered at INR 10 LPA. JECRC University also provides a 9 month paid internship to gain hands on industry experience.

CODE Jaipur courses under B.Des, M.Des, B.Des+MBA and B.Arch degrees. Additionally, the institute also offers Diploma and PhD programs. Admission is done through an online application.
